Package com.aep.dao

Class CourseDAOImpl

java.lang.Object
com.aep.dao.CourseDAOImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CourseDAO
public class CourseDAOImpl extends Object implements CourseDAO
Implementation of the CourseDAO interface. Handles database interactions for the Course table.
